title: Ep 53: Ignorant Man
description:
Today's proceedings: A listener details a scandalous polyamorous relationship, a wife catches her husband trying to remove contraceptives, a tax evader finds out his wife has been unfaithful, and a boyfriend gets his just deserts when commenting on other people's weight.  We also read some of our favorite reviews and comments received from the listeners!    
SPONSORS: https://www.Manscaped.com | Use code: "judgies" to get 20% off plus FREE SHIPING

Music by: Iván
